org.nlpcraft.model.intent

Class NCIntentSolver.TERM

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nlpcraft.model.intent.NCIntentSolver.TERM
  • Enclosing class:
    NCIntentSolver

    public static final class NCIntentSolver.TERM
extends Object
    Term is a building block of the INTENT. Term is a collection of one or more ITEMs. Intent has a list of terms that all have to be found in the user input for the intent to match. Note that order of items is not important for matching the term.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TERM(NCIntentSolver.ITEM... items)
      Creates new term with given parameters.
      TERM(NCIntentSolver.Predicate pred, int min, int max)
      Shortcut constructor for term with a single item.
      TERM(String expr, int min, int max)
      Shortcut constructor for term with a single string-based rule.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TERM

        public TERM(NCIntentSolver.ITEM... items)
        Creates new term with given parameters.
        Parameters:
        items - List of items that define conditions for that term to match.

      • TERM

        public TERM(NCIntentSolver.Predicate pred,
            int min,
            int max)
        Shortcut constructor for term with a single item. It is equivalent to: 
              this(new ITEM(ptrn, min, max));
        Parameters:
        pred - Built-in token predicate: either one of the logical combinators or RULE.
        min - Minimum quantifier for this predicate.
        max - Maximum quantifier for this predicate.

      • TERM

        public TERM(String expr,
            int min,
            int max)
        Shortcut constructor for term with a single string-based rule. It is equivalent to: 
              this((String)null, new ITEM(new RULE(expr), min, max));
        Parameters:
        expr - Whitespace separated string of parameter, its operation and value for the RULE.
        min - Minimum quantifier for this predicate.
        max - Maximum quantifier for this predicate.

    • Method Detail

        Gets the collection of term items.
        Returns:
        Collection of term items.
